part.content: CHAPTER II : OF NOTES, BILLS AND CHEQUES. Sec. 4 - 25.
CHAPTER III : PARTIES TO NOTES, BILLS AND CHEQUES. Sec. 26 - 45A.
CHAPTER VI : OF PAYMENT AND INTEREST. SeC. 78 - 81.
CHAPTER VII : OF DISCHARGE FROM LIABILITY ON NOTES, BILLS AND CHEQUES. Sec. 82 - 90.
CHAPTER VIII : OF NOTICE OF DISHONOUR. Sec. 91 - 98.
CHAPTER IX : OF NOTING AND PROTEST. Sec. 99 - 104A.
CHAPTER X : OF REASONABLE TIME. Sec. 105 - 107.
CHAPTER XI : OF ACCEPTANCE AND PAYMENT FOR HONOUR AND REFERENCE IN CASE OF NEED. Sec.108 - 116.
CHAPTER XIII : SPECIAL RULES OF EVIDENCE. Sec. 118 - 122.
CHAPTER XIV : OF CROSSED CHEQUES. Sec. 123 - 131A.
CHAPTER XV : OF BILLS IN SETS. Sec. 132 - 133.
CHAPTER XVI : OF INTERNATIONAL LAW. Sec. 134 - 137.
CHAPTER XVII : OF PENALTIES IN CASE OF DISHONOUR OF CERTAIN CHEQUES FOR INSUFFICIENCY OF FUNDS IN THE ACCOUNTS. Sec. 138 - 147.
